decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of 15 (Drainage). Therefore, the proposal would fail to prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with relevant policy requirements including but not limited to London Plan  Policy SI 13 (Sustainable Drainage) of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 15 (Drainage Strategy) of planning permission 22/00574/FUL (Demolition of existing block of 5no.x garages and erection of a new 3 bed 5 person detached dwelling with associated amenity space, parking, cycle and refuse storage.)
